item.description:
Fun, Sports, Relaxing and Socializing! Don't miss our 2010 Winter Cruise!!

Call Greg @ 917-868-4268 if interested,
Book now and mention Cruise Meetup or FUN MEETUP for $50 off the cruise and $50 off a WEEKEND THIS SUMMER @ Getaway in Kent,CT , call me @ 917-868-4268 if any questions ! http://MeetupCruise.c... , click Book Now on the right, prices starting at $699 (plus tax/tip/port fees/airfare to Florida)


feb. 20th - 27th, 2010, Book Today !!!

This year we’ll be cruising to Key West, Grand Cayman, Roatan (Honduras), and Cozumel. With the exclusive excursion package in every port, you’ll go to the hottest beaches, the coolest clubs and have the most exciting adventures.

The Experience

The Sports & Adventure Cruise offers:
Hundreds of fun-loving guests on board
Exclusive Sports & Activities throughout the day. Over-the-top cocktail parties, dinner parties, deck parties & dance parties every night
The Getaway Crew keeps the activities & fun going 'round the clock
Exclusive hand-picked excursions at every port
Complimentary roommate matching service
Exclusive Activities & Events on The Sports & Adventure Fun Cruise:

Volleyball Clinics & Tournaments
Tennis Lessons & Play
Wine Tasting
Water Aerobics
Pub Crawls
Yoga & Massage Classes
Hot Tub Parties
Latin & Swing Dance Classes
The Best Parties Afloat
The Trivia Challenge
The Sports Olympics
Caribbean Deck Party
Power Walks
Fitness Classes
Speed dating
Karaoke
Cooking Classes
Dodge Ball
Learn to Gamble Class
Golf Lessons
Ping Pong Tournaments
Open Dining Room Seating
Late Night Dance Parties


Book now and save $50 off the cruise AND $50 off a 2010 weekend @getaway, call me @ 917-868-4268 if any questions ! http://funmeetupgetaw...

group.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org

item.name: Great Fun, Sports, Relaxing and Socializing, Join us on our CruiseMeetup Event
